name: Default Email Sender Name in WP
author: Shahala Anjum

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.description:
You don’t need to make any extra settings, just activating this plugin sets the default sender email and name to admin email and site title respectively
Once installed it automatically sets the sender email to admin email and replaces the wordpress@domain.com and sets the sender name to site title
